thread.title: Pregnant Amy Childs struggling with 'pains' as she opens up about fears for her unborn baby
thread.title_full: Pregnant Amy Childs struggling with 'pains' as she opens up about fears for her unborn baby

author: Joshua Haigh
title: Pregnant Amy Childs struggling with 'pains' as she opens up about fears for her unborn baby
text:
Pregnant Amy Childs struggling with 'pains' as she opens up about fears for her unborn baby The former TOWIE star has been struggling with terrible back pain Share Amy's having a tough time (Photo: Ralph Petts/FameFlynet.uk.com) Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Amy Childs has opened up about how tough she's finding her first pregnancy. 
The former TOWIE babe announced back in October that she is expecting her first child with boyfriend Bradley Wright. 
The reality star has revealed that she's been experiencing bad aches and pains in recent weeks, which has left her concerned about her baby. 
In her latest column, Amy told fans that she's been struck with severe back pain that's left her worried about the position of her unborn child. Amy is expecting her first child (Photo: FameFlynet UK Tel : +44 (0)20 3551 5049 Email : info@fameflynet.uk.com) The red-haired star isn't finding pregnancy easy (Photo: FameFlynet) 
Amy said: “I’ve got a check-up for a couple of weeks, but I’m worried the baby is back-to-back – only because I’ve had such bad back pain. I really hope it’s all just part of my pregnancy.” 
She previously revealed her fears about breast feeding her newborn, and admitted that she'd gone to fellow reality star Sam Faiers for advice. Read More Coronation Street fans spot major flaws in Leanne Battersby's labour scenes - did you notice any? 
The reality star told her readers: “I had a long chat with Sam [Faiers] about breastfeeding, as I’m in a bit of a panic. Lots of people telling me I have to do it, but others are saying I’m putting too much pressure on myself. 
"I really want to, but I’m scared I won’t be able to," she added. She shared a picture of her unborn baby recently (Photo: Splash/Instagram) Amy's been going to Sam Faiers for advice (Photo: BBC) 
Clearly unable to contain her excitement after going for the scan, the mother-to-be shared a snapshot of her baby with her 390,000 followers. 
The high-tech image shows the reality star's child in striking detail, with the baby's features clearly defined and pronounced. 
Seemingly lost for words at seeing her child's face, the emotional star simply captioned the snap: "Words can't describe how much I love you." Like us on Facebook
